DEVICE_WYAPP_RUN.description: The run button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_STOP.description: The stop button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_TASK_MANAGER.description: The button for the task manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_PACKAGE_MANAGER.description: The button for the package manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_NETWORK_MANAGER.description: The button for the network manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_DISCONNECT.description: The disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_RESTART.description: The reboot and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_TURNOFF.description: The power off and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_ANOTHER_USER.message: The device is already connected to another user.

DEVICE_WYAPP_SETTINGS.description: Title of popup that contains details about the connected board

DEVICE_WYAPP_LANGUAGES.description: Programming languages supported by the board
